video_title: How to build a $1M+ vertical SaaS business (step-by-step guide)

content_profile.title: How to build a $1M+ vertical SaaS business (step-by-step guide)

key_takeaways: Solution: Use scientific approach with industry analysis checklist (Difficulty: intermediate)
Growth Tactic: Start with SMBs then move up-market (Channel: direct-sales)
AI Workflow: Market research using AI
Strategy: Pick an industry first, not an idea - focus on industry characteristics
Strategy: Target industries with healthy mix of small, mid-market, and enterprise businesses

startup_ideas.title: Vertical SaaS for specific industries with good segmentation

startup_ideas.validation: Direct interaction with businesses in target industry
startup_ideas.estimated_investment: Can be bootstrapped unlike broad SaaS

trend_opportunities.title: Return to vertical SaaS after broad startup concept failures
